name: ARFaceTrackingConfiguration
desc: A configuration that tracks facial movement and expressions using the front camera.

items.name: class var supportsWorldTracking: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the iOS device supports tracking the user's facial features in a world-tracking session.

items.name: var isWorldTrackingEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that instructs a session to provide the app with user face data during a world-tracking session.

items.name: var maximumNumberOfTrackedFaces: Int
items.desc: The number of faces to track during the session.

items.name: class var supportedNumberOfTrackedFaces: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of faces that the framework can track.
